page.title: 05Fruit growing near Kexby.
page.content: My aunty owns an orchard near the Lincolnshire village of Kexby.I help her out when the weather is fine.I live in Gainsborough and have to cycle to get to her orchard. She picks the apples by placing a {vibrator}around the base of the tree.When this is switched on most of the apples fall off the tree and are collected on a cloth on the ground. I climb up a ladder to pick the apples that do not fall off the tree.The apples then go on a conveyor belt to be sorted out into their different sizes. My aunt also keeps chickens and turkeys.The turkeys are given speciial food to fatten them up for{Christmas. She sells all the fruit and the birds to shops in Gainsborough.
